name: Chompania
description:
Embark on an out-of-this-world odyssey with Eddie, a stranded explorer trying to break free from the quirky landscapes of Chompania.

Unravel the planet's secrets, solve perplexing riddles, and engage in encounters with the local wildlife. Each level is a cosmic challenge, blending the classic platformer fun and head-scratching puzzles.

Will you outsmart the intergalactic enigmas that block your path, or will you be swept away by the weirdness of this alien world?

The universe is counting on you to guide Eddie to freedom!
